name: 吳忠敏
objective: The purpose of this course is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data. A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well.
